item.title: Man Bites Dog
item.description: Repeatedly attacked by a small, but persistent, neighborhood Chihuahua name Juan, jogger John "Choppers" McNabb finally got fed up and took action: He bit Juan back. Now Juan's owners are suing McNabb for veterinary bills. McNabb has countersued, seeking to recover the costs of treatment for multiple bite wounds.
item.author: Basil Ironthrower

item.title: President Falls
item.description: While stepping off Air Force One, the President tripped, fell onto the tarmac, and bruised his right pinky. ...
item.author: Judith Foinsapp
